short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Efficiently manage and control your browser extensions from the sidebar, enhancing your browsing experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
1. Quick Access: Manage extensions directly from the browser sidebar.
2. Boost Performance: Easily disable unused extensions to improve browser speed.
3. Enhanced Productivity: Switch between extensions effortlessly.
4. User-Friendly Interface: Choose between icon and list views for intuitive management.
5. Search Function: Find extensions quickly with built-in search.
6. Developer Tools: Identify and manage development extensions easily.
